articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Tata Consumer signs pacts to buy Capital Foods, Organic India - The Economic Times
articles.description: TCPL will acquire 75% of Capital Foods upfront and the remaining 25% over the next three years. Invus Group and US private equity group General Atlantic will divest their respective 40% and 35% stakes. Invus is a European family office and investment arm. ET …
articles.content: Tata Consumer Products Ltd (TCPL) announced on Friday that it has signed definitive agreements to fully acquire Capital Foods, owner of Ching's Secret and Smith & Jones, and Organic India, the Fa… [+2880 chars]
